name: Recipe: Cheesy Crab Hotpot
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Cheesy Crab Hotpot.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
Increases all party members' Max HP by <color=#37ffff>20–30%</color> and Energy Recharge by <color=#37ffff>14-20%</color> for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
25
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Cheesy Crab Hotpot
customize.desc: A glittering, gold-topped feast. The ingredients are pre-fried and layered in a casserole dish before being baked until the cheesy topping begins to bubble. Whether for a family dinner or a festive gathering, this luxurious classic is sure to elicit gasps of admiration from everyone present.

customize.name: Delicious Cheesy Crab Hotpot
customize.desc: A glittering, gold-topped feast. The sweetness of crab meat is like the first ray of dawn that pierces the clouds. The dense, savory aroma of cheese invites the radiance of the morning sun onto your tastebuds, bathing your mouth in a warm, golden glow. The sensation of bliss sweeps a soul-warming path from your tongue to your stomach, uniting all your senses in adoration.

customize.name: Suspicious Cheesy Crab Hotpot
customize.desc: A glittering, gold-topped feast. The charred ingredients stick stubbornly to the casserole dish, and after you tried your best to dredge up a spoonful, the first bite sent shivers down your spine. It's like you're being targeted by some sort of magma effigy — your senses scream at you to flee...

customize.name: Recipe: Cheesy Crab Hotpot
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Cheesy Crab Hotpot.

customize.name: Cheesy Crab Hotpot
customize.desc: A glittering, gold-topped feast. The ingredients are pre-fried and layered in a casserole dish before being baked until the cheesy topping begins to bubble. Whether for a family dinner or a festive gathering, this luxurious classic is sure to elicit gasps of admiration from everyone present.

customize.name: Crab
customize.desc: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

value.text: Reward for reaching max Reputation Level for 6 tribes in Natlan
